attributes.action: Start a national pension scheme for UK workers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many of us, do not have a pension because of fear of mismanagement by the city. We want the PM to introduce a national pension scheme where stamps can be purchased from post offices, newagents, online, telephone where the money is invested in national projects such as the olympic stadium etc, where our money is protected and guaranteed to be there when we retire.
